segments.text: Do you know the highest mountain in the world ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It is Everest , also called Zhumulangma in China . It is 8,844 . 43 meters above the sea level .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! That must be really awesome to stand on the top of the mountain to overlook the earth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , it is impossible because the mountain is covered with snow all year around . And is has heavy fog for most of the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have people set foot on its peak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it has been conquered by many people in history .
segments.speaker: S2
